blocked_text_fraud.message: Fraudulent pages try to trick you into sending money for illegal gain.

blocked_text_malware.message: Dangerous pages try to install harmful software without your permission.

blocked_text_miner.message: Miner pages use your device to mine cryptocurrency, which can slow it down and reduce its lifespan.

blocked_text_phish.message: Phishing pages try to steal sensitive information like passwords or credit card details by pretending to be trustworthy.

blocked_text_pua.message: The page tried to download an unwanted app that could harm your device or compromise your data.

blocked_text_untrusted.message: Untrusted pages behave suspiciously and may pose risks to your data.

extName.message: Protect Your Online Privacy and Security (Currently in Development @Hackathon)

footer_feedback_note.message: This extension is still under development. You may encounter some bugs.

popup_text_safe.message: No suspicious elements found on this page.

settings_add_field_title.message: Manually add or remove websites below:

settings_current_website_add_title.message: Add current website to the list

settings_search_text.message: Warns about dangerous web pages in search results.

settings_threat_text.message: Scans web pages for threats, phishing, and fraud attempts.

started_feedback_text.message: We welcome your feedback to improve SafeSurf.

started_search_text.message: SafeSurf warns about risky web pages in search results.

started_threat_text.message: SafeSurf blocks online threats, phishing, and fraud attempts.

started_tracker_text.message: Identifies trackers that analyze your browsing behavior.

text_disabled_search_analyzer.message: Search Advisor is disabled. Enable in settings.

text_disabled_threat_filter.message: Web Protection is disabled. Enable in settings.

text_session_whitelist_popup.message: This page is skipped from scanning in the current browsing session

text_untrusted.message: This page may be safe, but some security threats have been reported.

text_whitelist.message: Add this page to your Exceptions list if it's safe. Then, you won't be warned about any threats on this page.

text_whitelist_popup.message: This page is skipped from scanning because it's in the Exceptions list.

text_whitelist_submit.message: Pages in the Exceptions list won't be scanned for threats.

text_whitelist_toast.message: Web page added to Exceptions list
